isp-id.name: isp-id
isp-id.description: isp-id for the in skill product

isp-id-list.name: isp-id-list
isp-id-list.description: the list of in-skill product IDs to get the summary for, seperate by comma. Please note that this option must not be used with --next-token and/or --max-results options.

isp-type.name: type
isp-type.description: type for the in-skill product. (SUBSCRIPTION / ENTITLEMENT / CONSUMABLE)

isp-status.name: status
isp-status.description: status for the in-skill product. (INCOMPLETE / COMPLETE / CERTIFICATION / PUBLISHED / SUPPRESSED)

is-associated-with-skill.name: is-associated-with-skill
is-associated-with-skill.description: whether or not the in-skill products are associated to a skill.

reference-name.name: reference-name
reference-name.description: reference name for the in-skill product.

templateUrl.name: template-url
templateUrl.description: url for the template to be used with

locales.name: locales
locales.description: Locale(s) to perform validations for. All locales are supported.

file.name: file
file.description: path to the target file input

csvFile.name: file
csvFile.description: path to the target file input

max-results.name: max-results
max-results.description: max results returned by the request

next-token.name: next-token
next-token.description: next token if the result is paginated

etag.name: etag
etag.description: the eTag from the resource's last update

sort-field.name: sort-field
sort-field.description: field by which to sort results

filters.name: filters
filters.description: string of semicolon-delimited filters in the format 'Name=[field],Values=[value1][,value2...]'.

account-id.name: account-id
account-id.description: account ARN of the Alexa For Business organization

endpoint-region.name: endpoint-region
endpoint-region.description: indicates the endpoint region used by the skill

json.name: json
json.description: JSON string for the request payload

text.name: text
text.description: utterance text input with which to simulate the skill.

force-new-session.name: force-new-session
force-new-session.description: starts a new dialog session before running the simulation.

quick.name: quick
quick.description: to opt out of a wait state.

repo-url.name: repo-url
repo-url.description: repo-url for the Alexa hosted skill

permission-type.name: permission-type
permission-type.description: Alexa hosted skill's permission type for the user

feedback-email.name: feedback-email
feedback-email.description: optional feedback email for beta test

certification-id.name: certification-id
certification-id.description: id of the certification, '~mostRecent' can be used for most recent certification
